description: The IB_MESSAGES_2 table contains basic information about In Basket messages.

columns.name: MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the task record.

columns.name: CCR_NOTE_ID
columns.description: This is the note ID for a coding query message.

columns.name: ORDER_DAT
columns.description: This column stores the contact date (DAT) of the order record linked to the message.

columns.name: ATTCHD_NOTE_REC_ID
columns.description: Stores the note record attached to this message.

columns.name: NOTIF_JOB_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the Job Type in the Batch Print Utility for the Notification


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


All

columns.name: CAS_CREAT_SRC_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
Case create source type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Referral


Claim


Order

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the case record for In Basket messages of type case.  This column is frequently used to link to the OR_CASE table.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number representing the reason for the In Basket messages of type case.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Approved


Denied


Request More Info


Moved


Removed


Canceled


Scheduled

columns.name: OR_LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the log record for In Basket messages of type log.  This column is frequently used to link to the OR_LOG table.

columns.name: OR_LOG_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number representing the reason for the In Basket messages of type log.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Documentation Complete


Request More Info

columns.name: EPT_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) for a patient contact associated with the In Basket message. This column should be replaced with IB_MESSAGE_PAT_ENCS.PAT_ENC_CSN_ID instead. Historical records will still use this column, but all new data will populate the other table and column. This will still be populated but may not contain the full set of data available in the other column and table.

columns.name: LINKED_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: This column store the episode of care record ID of a linked episode.

columns.name: GEN_OVERDUE_MSG_ID
columns.description: Stores the original message of an overdue message.
